location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], Writing from Maghil, to Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], informs Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, that he has not received any communications from him since 19 November 1802. Manesty states that the Teignmouthproceeds to Bushire, conveying Colonel Harcourt on his return to India. He encloses a packet for Major John Malcom [Malcolm].
